title: A Book of Rhyming Words
description: Just as it says, this is a book of rhyming words, but it is no mere book of words that rhyme. The book is designed for kids 0-2 years of age, but it is entertaining for the whole family. The vivid pictures are brought to life through the rhyming verse that drives the story. Children can use this book to learn about the mechanics of language and how to use words properly. It is a language building story that is tons of fun. Rule, cool, drool, fool, the words of this book are fun to read and that helps the children maintain their focus as they move through the story.
author: Leela Hope
